flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: It stores electricnenergy under verynhigh pressure.fIt often explodesnwith little or nonprovocation.
It stores electricnenergy under verynhigh pressure.fIt often explodesnwith little or nonprovocation.
Stores electricalnenergy inside itsnbody. Even thefslightest shockncould trigger anhuge explosion.
It is dangerous.nIf it has too muchnelectricity andfhas nothing to do,nit amuses itselfnby exploding.
It stores an over­nflowing amount ofnelectric energyfinside its body.nEven a small shocknmakes it explode.
The more energy itncharges up, thenfaster it gets.fBut this alsonmakes it morenlikely to explode.
ELECTRODE eats electricity in thenatmosphere. On days when lightningnstrikes, you can see this POKéMONfexploding all over the place fromneating too much electricity.

One of ELECTRODE’s characteristics isnits attraction to electricity.nIt is a problematical POKéMON thatfcongregates mostly at electricalnpower plants to feed on electricitynthat has just been generated.
They appear in great numbers at electricnpower plants. Because they feed onnelectricity, they cause massive andnchaotic blackouts in nearby cities.
It explodes in response to even minornstimuli. It is feared, with the nicknamenof “The Bomb Ball.”
It stores electric energy under very highnpressure. It often explodes with little ornno provocation.
It is known to drift on winds if itnis bloated to bursting with storednelectricity.
It is known to drift on winds if itnis bloated to bursting with storednelectricity.
It is known to drift on winds if itnis bloated to bursting with storednelectricity.
It is dangerous. If it has too muchnelectricity and has nothing to do,nit amuses itself by exploding.
It stores an overflowing amount ofnelectric energy inside its body.nEven a small shock makes it explode.
Il se laisse porter par les ventsnlorsque son corps est gonflénd’électricité à en éclater.
It is known to drift on winds if itnis bloated to bursting with storednelectricity.
Il se laisse porter par les ventsnlorsque son corps est gonflénd’électricité à en éclater.
It is known to drift on winds if itnis bloated to bursting with storednelectricity.
It is known to drift on winds if itnis bloated to bursting with storednelectricity.
It is known to drift on winds if itnis bloated to bursting with storednelectricity.
すこしの　しげきに　はんのうしてnばくはつする。バクダンボールというnあだなで　こわがられて　いる。
작은 자극에도 반응해서n폭발한다. 폭탄볼이라 불리며n두려움의 대상이 되고 있다.
Il explose au moindre choc. Son seul surnom den« Bomb Ball » suffit à effrayer ses adversaires.
Es explodiert schon bei kleinsten Reizen.nSein Spitzname „Die Bombenkugel“ spiegeltndie Furcht der Menschen wider.
Explotan a la mínima. Por eso se les tiene muchonmiedo. Estos Pokémon reciben el mote de Bomba Ball.
Può esplodere anche alla minima provocazione.nLo chiamano “Bomba Ball”.
It explodes in response to even minor stimuli. It isnfeared, with the nickname of “The Bomb Ball.”
少しの　刺激に　反応してn爆発する。バクダンボールというnあだ名で　怖がられている。
あふれるほどの　でんきエネルギーをnたいないに　ためこんでいるのでnすこしの　しげきで　ばくはつする。
넘칠 정도의 전기 에너지를n체내에 모으고 있기 때문에n약간의 자극만으로도 폭발한다.
Il stocke tellement d’énergie dans son corpsnqu’une simple secousse peut le faire exploser.
Es speichert eine riesige Menge Elektrizität innseinem Körper. Es explodiert beim kleinsten Ruck.
Almacena una enorme cantidad de electricidad en suncuerpo. Una pequeña sacudida le hará explotar.
Dato che accumula nel proprio corpo un’incredibilenquantità di elettricità, esplode alla minimanprovocazione.
It stores an overflowing amount of electric energyninside its body. Even a small shock makesnit explode.
あふれるほどの　電気エネルギーをn体内に　ためこんでいるのでn少しの　刺激で　爆発する。
くうきちゅうの　でんきエネルギーを　たべる。nカミナリの　おちる　ひは　でんきを　たべすぎたnマルマインが　あちらこちらで　だいばくはつする。
공기 중의 전기 에너지를 먹는다.n번개가 치는 날에는 전기를 너무 먹은n붐볼이 이곳저곳에서 대폭발한다.
Électrode mange l’électricité qui se trouve dans l’atmosphère.nLes jours d’orage, on peut voir ce Pokémon explosernsans arrêt parce qu’il a avalé trop d’électricité.
Lektrobal ernährt sich von Elektrizität aus der Atmosphäre.nAn Tagen, an denen es blitzt, explodiert dieses Pokémonndauernd, da es zu viel Elektrizität zu sich nimmt.
Los Electrode se alimentan de la electricidad de la atmósfera.nEn días de tormenta con rayos, es fácil verlos explotando porntodos lados tras haber consumido demasiada electricidad.

Electrode si nutre dell’elettricità presente nell’atmosfera.nQuando i fulmini solcano il cielo, è possibile scorgere moltindi questi Pokémon esplodere per aver ingerito un’eccessivandose di elettricità.
Electrode eats electricity in the atmosphere. On days whennlightning strikes, you can see this Pokémon exploding all overnthe place from eating too much electricity.
空気中の　電気エネルギーを　食べる。nカミナリの　落ちる　日は　電気を　食べ過ぎたnマルマインが　あちらこちらで　大爆発する。
でんきに　ひきよせられる　せいしつを　もつ。nおもに　はつでんしょに　あつまってきて　つくったnばかりの　でんきを　たべてしまう　こまりものだ。
전기에 끌리는 성질을 지녔다.n주로 발전소에 모여서 막 만들어진n전기를 먹어버리는 말썽꾼이다.

L’une des caractéristiques d’Électrode est son attirancenpour l’électricité. Ces Pokémon posent problème lorsqu’ilsnse rassemblent dans les centrales électriques pour se nourrirnde courant fraîchement généré.

Typisch für Lektrobal ist seine große Faszination für Elektrizität.nEs ist ein problematisches Pokémon, das sich meistens innKraftwerken niederlässt, wo es sich von frisch erzeugtem Stromnernähren kann.

Una de las características de Electrode es la atracción quensiente hacia la electricidad. Son Pokémon problemáticos quensuelen agruparse cerca de centrales eléctricas para nutrirsende la energía recién generada.

Una delle caratteristiche di Electrode è la sua affinità connl’elettricità. Si tratta di un Pokémon problematico che spessonsi raduna attorno alle centrali elettriche per trarre nutrimentondall’elettricità appena generata.

One of Electrode’s characteristics is its attraction to electricity.nIt is a problematical Pokémon that congregates mostly atnelectrical power plants to feed on electricity that has justnbeen generated.
電気に　引き寄せられる　性質を　持つ。n主に　発電所に　集まってきて　つくったnばかりの　電気を　食べてしまう　困りものだ。
すこしでも　しょうげきを　あたえるとnたいないの　エレクトンエネルギーがnあふれて　ばくはつ　してしまう。
조금이라도 충격을 주면n체내에 있는 전기 에너지가n넘쳐서 폭발해버린다.
只要受到任何一點衝擊，n體內的電能就會迅速膨脹n然後爆炸。
Il stocke de l’énergie électrique dans son corps,nce qui le rend instable et explosif.
Es speichert elektrische Energie in seinemnKörper. Schon die geringste Erschütterungnlässt es explodieren.
Almacena tal cantidad de energía eléctrica ennsu cuerpo que el más leve impacto puedenprovocar una gran explosión.
L’energia elettrica accumulata nel suo corponpuò provocare un’esplosione al minimo urto.
Stores electrical energy inside its body. Even thenslightest shock could trigger a huge explosion.
少しでも　衝撃を　与えるとn体内の　エレクトンエネルギーがnあふれて　爆発　してしまう。
只要受到一点撞击，n就会由于体内的n电能溢出导致爆炸。
